author: terencechain
content:
One take away from the call is we might want to remove `parentHash` from `engine_getInclusionListV1`, such that to build an inclusion list, just give me a list of censored txs based on your subjective view vs a list of txs + valid on top of this parent hash. 

This reason we want to do this for epbs is because PTC deadlne for blob will always be later than IL submission deadline, so using `parentHash` in epbs would likely always be a slot delayed. Without `parentHash` you could at least import txs more timely and just rely on attesters to filter them out 

cc <@845691100072509460> <@725415098331430932> 

reference: https://github.com/jihoonsong/execution-apis/blob/1c22e31fb7ffab128e48ba2b0b6da9d469382bbe/src/engine/experimental/eip7805.md#engine_getinclusionlistv1
